thread.title: Great Stay
thread.title_full: Great Stay - Review of ME London, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Sammywammy1
title: Great Stay
text:
Stayed here for 1 night in March, everything was great from the prosecco at check in to the chocolate hearts on your pillow at bed time! The rooms are really nice we had one with a balcony with a great view overlooking London!
All the staff here are really friendly. Want to thank Karim in security as I left some jewellery behind and soon as I reported it a few days later once I realised it was sent back to me the next day!
